2021-01-04
var getNative = require('../internal/getNative'); /* Native method references for those with the same name as other `lodash` methods. */ var nativeNow = getNative(Date, 'now'); /** * Gets the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since the Unix epoch * (1 January 1970 00:00:00 UTC). * * @static * @memberOf _ * @category Date * @example * * _.defer(function(stamp) { * console.log(_.now() - stamp); * }, _.now()); * // => logs the number of milliseconds it took for the deferred function to be invoked */ var now = nativeNow || function() { return new Date().getTime(); }; module.exports = now;
